user_query: Can you create a mindmap that explores effective time management strategies specifically for students? I want to learn about study scheduling, prioritization methods, avoiding procrastination, and balancing academic and personal time.
requirements: Include study scheduling techniques (time blocking, Pomodoro technique)
Cover prioritization methods (Eisenhower matrix, ABC method)
Add strategies for overcoming procrastination and maintaining focus
Include tips for balancing study time with extracurricular activities and rest
